website_summaries.verdict: Improves the ambiance of your car’s interior with app-controlled LED strips.
pros: Includes more than 16 colors that can be selected via remote or Bluetooth smartphone app, but you can create your own color if you wish
A selection of musical tones play to indicate your selection
When you listen to music in your car, the lights sync up to the rhythm
cons: Some customers have found the smartphone app and remote to be non-intuitive and clumsy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does exactly what we wanted them to do. We put these lights in my husbands truck for the kids and they absolutely love them. I just haven’t figured out how to make them go to music. But that’s operator error.. haha
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cook

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in 2 days, scanned the picture on the box, installed software, plugged in, Awesome! I included some pictures, has very strong 3m adhesive. Also strip well protected. Long cables. You can change colors with phone, it remembers last setting when you turn off. Switch on the cigarette lighter, or you can turn on and off with the software. Flash colors, also adjustable brightness too. I really couldn't find anything wrong.
customer_reviews.author: oherc

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! They work great. I've even recommended them to my uber fb group. People complained that the app wasn't working for some, but it worked perfect on my note 5. They plug into a cig outlet and have 3m tape to apply wherever. They went over well for the st Patrick's day crowd. In the app there is a setting to have them play to music but I haven't messed with that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car led lights!
customer_reviews.text: These were better than expected. I love how they change colors too. I've seen other lights but not as bright as these. So that was an absolute plus. I would recommend these lights to anyone who wants to add a little something special to make your car stand out. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: JSussick

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Just installed them today. They come with a cigarette plug In power source but I hardwired them in. Try are bright and easy to work. Love this product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Castro

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised bi if you use Bluetooth for calls or music in your car these lights are a problem. It will unpair all bluetooth devices on your phone each and everytime you use these lights. So I would not recommend these lights if you use any Bluetooth devices.
customer_reviews.author: slyman64

customer_reviews.title: Cost me $210 for a new car battery (completely drained)
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to install, but that’s where it stops on the positive side. First the adhesive is terrible, just will not stick. Now for the very bad, this device completely drained my car battery over night and the car wouldn’t start. Had to jump it off and appeared to ruin the battery cell. Had to buy a brand new $210 battery to get the car starting again. So this cheap light solution for $20 cost me a grand total of $230. I was so upset I just threw the lights away and not worth anymore of my time to return them. Like the other reviews said, pure junk! Don’t buy this crap.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love these car lights! If you want your car to stand out, then get these lights. Lots of different colors. Turn on the music and watch it change colors! Must use the app on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Mace

customer_reviews.title: Just give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: It is great! Super bright and you can make it less bright. Can change the color to many others! I installed in in my honda accord 2019 and it looks great! Update: stoped working?
customer_reviews.author: Karoline reyes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these last week in a 20 Toyota Camry. The supplied length of cable is just right if you plan to run through the driver side into the passenger side under console, and hide cables appropriately. The adhesion is rock solid with the double sided tape and included wipe for extra adhesion. The app has synched for me just fine, and the lights are bright and adjust to about any color imaginable. The ONLY downside is the music only synchs with downloaded or purchased Apple Music. The ability to synch to a music streaming service would be a massive upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Bright and sticks great!
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived it was a car lighter plug in. Because i wanted to put it on a motorcycle i took apart the cigarette lighter plug and ran the positive and negative wires to a switch. This works flawlessly. Only down side is the app that is used with this product is junk. It works to change colors but dont look for it to do much custom settings. Would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: bad adhesive decent brightness
customer_reviews.text: I used 5o have some old school led strips in my old car. They were a single color with no phone control however they were much brighter. And the adhesive strips don't stick at ALL. I cleaned the surface I was sticking it to and no luck. Ended up having to super glue them and now they work fine. So two things; Not as bright as I would be liked them to be and the "ahdesive" doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Osborne

customer_reviews.title: horrible.
customer_reviews.text: the app for these is horrible for one. two you have to press a big red button which plugs into the outlet in the car to turn them completely off. three they do not stick well at all. I put them up & they stayed up maybe a day.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Courtney

customer_reviews.title: The app is complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: But the lights do their job and have a lot of different color options. I wish there was a better application to be used with these lights. I just set the colors and don’t use the app anymore since it turns on automatically to the last color or gradient. Hardwired into my car with a switch attached to my headlights to control. First set of lights didn’t work but the seller shipped a new pair without a hitch for exchange. TEST BEFORE YOU SPLICE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Plimith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: They were nice at first and easy to set up and use but a week or two after installation the lights started coming on randomly and the color choices were distorted and would not work properly. They would come on randomly when they were turned off and drain the battery if you went anywhere. I was going to install a power cut off switch but felt it was pointless since the colors weren’t working either. Terrible Christmas present to my girlfriend and I don’t think I’ll be purchasing anything from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam moran

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful, installed under the dash
customer_reviews.text: The cool thing about this light setup is that it had a cigarette lighter power connected, doesn't have to be hardwired like my other one. I installed it on my 13 F150, the remote works flawless and had different programmable functions as well as the default buttons. The only problem is my truck is a constant power source when the vehicle is turned off. So, I just had to remember to either power down from the remote or unplug before I got out of my vehicle. Definitely would recommend this product due to functionality, and price point
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Need to read instructions carefully, if so you will enjoy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these LED lights hoping they would be a breeze to install. And physically they were and they look great but the synching to your phone and music needs some help. I struggled a bit to the app to synch to my phone and finally to my music but after several attempts I got it to work. The app still needs to be refined but overall I like them especially my kids since now we jam to music coupled by these cool LED lights. Overall good purchase just wish the initial setup was a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Juan M. Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Not enough stick
customer_reviews.text: It’s good for the price , honestly they wouldn’t stick well on certain materials and the cords aren’t super long so you have to play around with it ! They don’t look too bad I just wish they were a tad bit brighter in the car , other than that it’s so awesome how they change how many modes they have and how cheap they were ! First day , so I will come back and let you guys know how they stick! Update : had them for about a week , terrible ! They do not stick at all they fall off when I’m driving I recommend another product
customer_reviews.author: nikki ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lighting with adjustable dimming options.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy the way this works and how nice it really make the interior of the car feel and look. Being that the LED's are adjustable in-terms of brightness really lets you pick the right dim light. The colors are fun. Yellow must be a hard color to get and is not my favorite lol. The tape adhesive doesn't stick too well to the underside of my vehicles front chairs due to the chairs having woolly material. The app os helpful. Will deffinetly buy again if I have to.
customer_reviews.author: Deslicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: These were a super easy install and it adds a good amount of light to my wife's van. I mounted them under the dash and front seats. There was plenty of cord to reach that far. I love that she can control the effects and color from her phone. The children are very excited to have it sync to the music, plus it adds a good amount of light to the floor which helps when they drop things.
customer_reviews.author: Jess R.

customer_reviews.title: These lights are awesome! As an Uber and Lyft driver
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome! As an Uber and Lyft driver, I wanted something to make my car fun, and entertaining, and these are it! I got them yesterday, and couldn't wait to hook them up! They look awesome! There is so many different options on the app for them. You can set you own color combinations, the speed, or have them flash to the beat of the music. My passengers will love these for sure. The wiring on them is plenty long enough for my Mazda 3. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, What it is
customer_reviews.text: They work well and they don’t wear out. The microphone and Bluetooth functions that go to the beat don’t really work, but I wasn’t really concerned about that. To install, I cut off the cigarette lighter adapter and hardwired it to A light in my car that came on with my parking lights. Two different cord blanks is a nice touch so you don’t have a huge amount in the front, but just enough cord length to go under the back of the front seats for the back foot Wells.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rushton

customer_reviews.title: Cool Lights BUT Extremely Easy to Break
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lights look great and the wireless functionality with the users’ smartphones makes this product not only easy to use and responsive and but really cool because of the wide array of the color palette. Cons: CAUTION - the cheap plastic housing for the plug-in/power button is extremely fragile and damages easily. Within just 1-week of owning it, mine broke as soon as a back seat passenger went to get out of my car. Conclusion: Product’s functionality is great but the cheap assembly makes for it not being worth the price. I wish I knew this before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben H

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this item
customer_reviews.text: Led went out within 2 month of use. Wifi app does not work that well. There are way better options than this item. Get the remote version if you still want this item. The app connects through bluetooth which will drain your phone battery. The music function only works with songs that is downloaded onto your phone. It does not work with tidal, spotify etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and good product. Very easy to install, as it has a sticky backing and plugs into the power output in your vehicle. App was easy to download and use. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because I don't think the sticky backing is the best way to install, as I may want to move the lights at a later date, the backing will just wear out. Also, I wish the wires were longer, as I have a quad cab truck and wanted to install 2 of the 4 lights in the back, but couldn't because they didn't reach.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: These lights are amazing for nighttime driving!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received these lights I put them in. Night time came around and these lights were amazing. They weren't so bright that I couldn't see around me, but not too dim. They lit up the places that needed light for my passengers as well as myself without having to turn on the interior lights. Even the police said it was a great light to have and wasnt a distraction to me as a driver or those driving around me. And the best part is that the lights move to the music I listen to! Definitely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lights look good the app works just fine not sure what other reviews are having issues with..? Cons: Adhesive backing is weak. It's sufficient but I question its long term durability. It's not that difficult to remove like you'd think it should be. Not the end of the world, wouldn't let it discourage you from buying it.
customer_reviews.author: David Ready

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: Color: APP Control Once i figured out the whole remote and app n ways to use them it was so easy to use and the kids love having them on the floor in the back seats so they can see while we drive at night and they r fun colors and i can still see while im driving they are painless to install i would highly reccomend this product if your in the market for some fun lights in your car
customer_reviews.author: Jessyka bennett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as it says
customer_reviews.text: This looks sick at first. But it wouldn't pick up on my bluetooth at first, and once paired it deleted all devices i had connected my bluetooth to. ALSO it says they sync up to music, BUT it doesn't tell you that it has to be downloaded to your phone. Sooooo spotify, apple music, amazon music. Yeahhhh none of that stuff will work with the app. And app wont let me create an account with it either. Should of gotten a different brand with a remote like in my room or on my computers
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Good overall.
customer_reviews.text: The app was a little confusing but they connect through BT initially and then automatically turn on from proximity after that. The 3M adhesion is standard although not good if someone trips the wire and you need to reapply it. The settings are not intuitive in the app but you can set up what colors you want to use and what mode. The brightness is medium which is good so that you can still look through your windows without the reflection blocking it. Pretty standard overall and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stepdaughter for Christmas, it was on her Christmas list. She is 20 years old and installed it herself. She said it was easy to install, she loves it and she gets a lot of compliments from her college friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Adams

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quality install to add detail
customer_reviews.text: I love my Focus SVT and in addition to halo led headlights, I wanted something I could enjoy from the cabin while driving. These LED strips are well worth every penny. Very bright, adhesive, and quality product. Install took about 5-10 min and wires are more than enough length to route and hide anything from sight. The Bluetooth app is very easy and automatically connects when your phone is near. The app is simple and has lots of lighting options. Would definitely recommend at the price and value of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Rixmann

customer_reviews.title: I love the brightness of the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the brightness of the color. I ordered the 1 controlled by the app and it doesn't have a USB cord. I suggest you order the 1 with the remote if you only have 1 cigarettes/charging port so that you can still charge your phone. I will be contacting the seller to change to remote controlled led lights because it's looks good in my car. I just want to be able to charge my phone and use the lights.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLuv Watson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the lights and the brightness of the lights are ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the lights and the brightness of the lights are amazing for the price.....buuuttttttttt the adhesive on the strip is not the best and fell off from a flat surface that I applied the led strip to only after 5 days. I am disapointed in the adhesive, but I won't be returning them because the brightness and functionality work great. Just be prepared to get some more adhesive or double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: NOrCalSam

customer_reviews.title: Find something better
customer_reviews.text: The lights were very nice when I got them. They started falling off after like 2 weeks. I tried to use double sided tape but that did not work. You have to get an app to control the lights which does not work. I personally would like it better if it was bluetooth because you can sync them to your music in your library but it does not do the whole library/playlist. Just one song. I use Spotify so it would be better if it was compatible with that or just give a remote so you do not need an app.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool, couple negatives though
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Wires were a little short so it took me awhile to figure out how best to install them, but I got it figured out. Tape is 3M double sided tape. Didn’t work after first application but luckily I use the same stuff at work hence the 4 stars, however the app hookup is pretty legit. Music feature didn’t work too well either. But color change is unlimited just about. Pretty cool flex
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very bright and are very easy to install. I would have given this 5 stars but it needs to be unplugged ( unfortunately I got a dead battery and had to get a jump lucky for me I was in my own driveway) when you get out of the car because it will leave you with a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Klinker

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality I am giving generously 3 stars actually that is just due to the price you get what you pay for I really thought this was going to be halfway decent for my son he of course is the one you picked out OK it and wish we could return it
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Lights were easy to install and provided ample light
customer_reviews.text: Lights were easy to install and provided ample light. Cons-The app is difficult to work and hard to make lights flash to music. If you are wanting ambient light or a set flash pattern these are great. If you are wanting lights to flash to your music I would suggest finding another set up.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Page

customer_reviews.title: Great Led with simple install. Works with music
customer_reviews.text: Works great out of the box. I have it in a SxS 4 seater , Polaris. They don’t bounce Exactly to the beat but I have it mounted kinda far from a speaker. I jumps colors , fades. Pick you led. Plug App works.
customer_reviews.author: RxDaily

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed these in our sons truck. Hes now the coolest kid in high school. He is able to control the colors through the app on his phone and when he listens to music he can make the lights change to the beat. He likes driving with them on red the most. Super easy to install. Might buy more for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: App won't connect. Some of the lights are not working in the strips. I plugged them in first, all the lights were blue. Installed everything, went good, easy. Then turned them off and on with the switch, lights went to different colors, some stopped working within a few minutes. Not very bright. And can't control brightness and color because app won't connect and no secondary controls. And not they're stuck and have to be peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great but the app is terrible. It DOES NOT connect and play with any music and the app is constantly freezing and crashing so I have to delete it and reinstall every time I need to change a color. I wish I would have gone with a remote operated option instead. If they could fix the app it would honestly be any amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Clay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product, it started to unstick at the end but was nothing a little glue could not help. Lights are bright and responsive to sound, they’re pretty cool! Also very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: C_E

customer_reviews.title: Google Translated instructions?
customer_reviews.text: I am guessing the person that created the little folded instruction sheet used Google Translate. It makes absolutely no sense at all. My phone & car are both up to date, but it wouldn't connect via Bluetooth. Plugging in works fine, it just blinks different colors. Also, the app had issues installing.
customer_reviews.author: zombieprintsdotcom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to the Jeep
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son easily installed the lights inside the vintage Jeep - and his friends LOVE them! We bought another set for our nephew. You can supposedly set them to flash to the beat of the music, but we haven't tried that quite yet.
customer_reviews.author: Camri Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Less than a week. Don’t buy...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly they adhesive only stuck for a week and then it fell off on the floor. When exiting the vehicle I stepped on the end with the connector and snapped. So it lasted all of a week and now I get to remove them from my carpet and toss them..... very disappointed. The wires I felt could have been a lot smaller. They are bulky and harder to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Kendell Holmes

customer_reviews.title: strong lights. Weak manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: The lights themselves are vibrant however everything else kinda needs work. The LED strip came out of 2/4 of the casings they came in so I had to slide it back in and take it. Secondly 2/4 of the adhesive strips didn’t actually stick. I bought adhesive spray to try and fix it but even that didn’t work. Lastly the “sound sensor” is really just a box that picks up even the hum of the motor so it really just looks like it’s having a seazure on your car. Like I said. Love the lights and the app is nice (for the most part, mic doesn’t work if you’re playing music from the same device...like your phone...)
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: It is trash
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's straight from a Chinese distributor not capable of spelling correctly in the instructions... In fact, the "instruction manual" they provided is spelt "instrection manual"🤦‍♂️... On to the actual product- its not as advertised. The App is trash and it doesn't work. I installed the lights in my car and they can only be one color. Dont buy this. You will be dissapointed. F#^* China
customer_reviews.author: David Denzy

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective one. Its just a light with a button. you guys can't make a light with a button? jesus. i have to hold down the button to make it light up. defective switch. thanks a lot. also, the tape doenst stick to leather. just falls off. so every part of this product sucks a D
customer_reviews.author: DocJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth programmable lights are easy to install & the app is easy to use. Which offers access to the lights even from outside of the vehicle. They work well & they are sufficiently bright plus they are fully programmable. Personally I've seen much more expensive lights that are not even near as good as these which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Go with the Remote! The app and sensor need work.
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed but certainly could use improvement. I purchased these for my vehicle that has two 12's and no matter which way i adjust them through the app it poorly responds to the music. You have yo turn the music down so low to get them to match with the beat. Also the app will not allow you to record videos while it is open. Another huge downside. Not bad for the price. Nice and bright. Just think it's honestly better without the sensor and just hard wiring into the amp wire.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE DONT BUY. the installing was simple and they looked really cool but completely drained my car battery in 20 minutes after installing. Don’t waste your money. Also the app is half in Chinese and makes no sense and doesn’t have an English option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and it was easy to install. Downloaded the app and it works as described. The lights are enclosed in protective tubing. Rather than using the plug connect in the front of my vehicle, I used the one for the back seat passengers. That way I did not have to see the red light.
customer_reviews.author: Neil in Morgan Hill

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky to use
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to weave all the wires through the care and was a little difficult at first to get them to stick but after all of that they turned out awesome!
customer_reviews.author: mya nelson

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing... for about 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed that this died. The two weeks that it worked it was amazing! I could control it from my phone, it had tons of cool settings, and it looked awesome in my car. After a couple weeks though it completely stopped working. not one light on it will work. It's just dead. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MeggieK

customer_reviews.title: Directions are in broken English.
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work out of the box. Wires were showing. Would come on and shut off. Directions are in broken English.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Lots of colors!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife for Christmas. We don't have them installed yet, but we did scan the barcode and downloaded the app. She loves all the colors that it produces. Cannot wait to install it for her so she can really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Craig

customer_reviews.title: I can see when I drop my phone in the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my truck and forgot I had them. Finally installed them after about a year or so. Bright, stuck well, but I will have to find a mounting point for the little box part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop the tri-color
customer_reviews.text: The product works but getting it to stay on one light is impossible. The app is horrible. It’s not easy to use at all. I’d give this a better review if I knew how to work the app. Installations easy but that’s the only thing that’s easy. I bought this one that connects to your phone thinking it would be better but I think the remote is better at this point. This has really stressed me out. I can’t find how to fix this problem either.
customer_reviews.author: RK16

customer_reviews.title: Great price and lights!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! The feature designed to play to sound isn’t great. But the app does what I need it to do and that’s just change the color. The solid colors work great, would have liked more lighting modes. But all I wanted was a solid color and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ambiance!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have colored lights on the floor in the front of my car. These were perfect! I like that I can change the colors to fit the mood at the time I'm driving and they can flash to the music I'm playing. It gives my new car a great ambiance. And It makes my car look sporty.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou Who

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The kit was easy to install but after just a couple of months the adhesive for the actual light strips is failing on all 4 strips. The surfaces were all cleaned and degreased and I also used adhesion promoter but it may be the Florida heat taking its toll on the adhesive. Overall this is a great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas E.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does not change colors like it says it will ! Waste of my money. I should have stuck to my previous lights. Only tried this since it said multiple color changes but it does not !
customer_reviews.author: Mone't

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, there’s enough cord length to get almost anywhere, and it’s almost too easy to instal. I would buy more but I don’t have anymore floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My odometer lights went out and I didn't want to take apart my dash to access the bulbs, so I use this. All I did was plug it in to a cigarette lighter plug, peel off the sheet to expose the "command strip", download the app, and it was ready to go. The only thing is that there is no instructions but was easy to figure out. The preset colors were off on the App (red was green, green was purple, etc.) but still happy with the product. You could adjust the brightness of the lights so that it is not distracting as you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very bright and they work well
customer_reviews.text: So I really like the product it works veryvwell. I have ordered it a couple times to install in friends vehicles, and overall they are satisfied with it and I am satisfied with it. There are some things that should be improved including the adhesive. It does not stick well to non flat surfaces.the only other biggest complaint is the app that runs it off a mobile device I don't know if you guys control that with that definitely could use a few updates on certain features.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: what the hell
customer_reviews.text: Literally not even 10 minutes after installing the lights burned out, and the black box literally burned out as well , like I didn't even have the chance to install the app because they went out so quick , I am honestly very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dante Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED strip lights for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s some nice little LED strip lights that works good for any car. I was surprised how well they work for the little amount of money they cost. They are well worth the price for what they are!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Work great for what it is. It sticks really where when you pit it on a surface that has enough room. The power adapter is easy to use. The app is alright, not the best. But once you get it, it's simple to use and easy to change colours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The LED lights are bright
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Bright LED lights that can be controlled on a app that has palette, giving you a variety of tones to choose from. Cons: I didn't like quality of the adhesive on the strip, some of the strips begin to curl or peel off as a result of not bonding to the vehicle. Overall this product does what it is suppose to do and at a great price. I would recommend it a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Need to attach better but good lights!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights but need to find a better way to attach them. Put them under the dash and the sticky side doesn't hold well on textured surface. Actually held better to the cloth but not long term. Maybe have an option for clips or hooks of some sort? Love having them though!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lights work great lights show different color than what you set it to on the app
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great they are easy to install however the app needs a bit of work in my opinion when you switch to some certain colors on the app it displays a completely different color on the lights in the car
customer_reviews.author: Kadrian J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, make your car more impressive.
customer_reviews.text: You can control the color, brightness of the lights on your phone! This is a very cool product and my kid love it. The only thing is i would turn it off when im driving, the light is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kuo

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTS ONLY WORKS WITH ITUNES (for iPhones)
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights, however I bought them solely for the fact the lights could match up to my music. AND THE LIGHTS MATCHED UP TO THE MUSIC HORRIBLY. & ARE ONLY ALLOWED TO BE USED FOR MUSIC I HAVE DOWNLOADED THROUGH ITUNES. I PAY AND USE SPOTIFY, SO I AM UNABLE TO USE THIS FEATURE. Which is quite annoying. If they make it compatable with Spotify or allow you to use the microphone feature along with Spotify at the same time, it would be better
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Combs

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I was mostly disappointed in the packaging as it was a gift for my son. He said the adhesion was not great.
customer_reviews.author: Ixcheal Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the cost,  good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, 3M tape is solid. App is not the most simple to use but it works. LEDs are very bright and look good. My only gripe is that the lights "forget" the settings previously used and run through the demo set up on start.
customer_reviews.author: J Casey

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE  GARBAGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.!!! After a few weeks you cannot connect to the controller and lights do whatever they want. Complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THESE SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the worst lights I’ve ever ordered. I got these back in January 2020 and they are already defective, the adhesive was not staying stuck onto the flat surfaces of my car. To add on to the awful adhesive the app is so bad that I kept it set on one color and then deleted the app. I tried to contact the supplier and the email was not a valid email. Don’t waste you time it’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Love them .
customer_reviews.text: These lights installed and worked well.The download was quick and adhesive made the installation fairly easy. Very fun to play with and the blue matches the lights already in the car. Great and fun !
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These leds are great, easy to install and seems like the 3m strip will hold for quite sometime. Color correct. Only thing is the app is alittle cheap looking. But it works, orange and yellow is alittle dim in color depth. But Its not to bad. I like these leds. And would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Drillbit Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value, super easy to instal and control
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son’s car and he loves them. They were super easy to install. It only took my husband 10 minutes to install them. You can keep them ome color or have them change colors. He controls them through a downloaded app on his phone LED BLE.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: It's good but Bluetooth might be a hassle
customer_reviews.text: These lights work like they should but using the bluetooth option might not be the best. I connect to my music using my car's bluetooth, however, if I wanted to change the color or flash pattern, it cuts out my audio and connects to the lights. They're great lights but if I were to buy them again, I would get the one with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: jyeow12

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: My only problem was the adhesive on one of them. Even with the primer, it still was hard to keep on.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product works great app easy to install all easy set up but buy double sided sticky tape because the sticky part it comes with will fall off! Still worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: teala Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: It is awesome! Only took about an hour to install and figure out where to hide the wires!! The colors are bright and radiant. My only dislike is that the 4 little 3M double sided tape that comes along with it is not very sticky. But $1 more for extra strong tape, and you are rock n’ rolling! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these lights for several months. No problems at all. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: LolliPopB

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for my daughter car,only issues is getting that 3m tape to stick enough to location in car,had to use the extra tape 3m tape to get them to stick
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. Bright lights and the app is easy to down load and use.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F

customer_reviews.title: Makes my 2017 Honda Fit feel like a Mayback
customer_reviews.text: Makes my 2017 Honda Fit feel like a Mayback. Wires are thin enough to tuck into the console and adhesives on LEDs are strong enkugh to grip on without 3rd party support. Lighting is bright and the app works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LED BLE app is TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 complaint but it's a killer. The app to run these lights is complete trash. It's LED BLE and it is horrible. After you pair to these lights it causes your BT to basically forget all your other devices and you have to REPAIR to EVERY DEVICE, EVERY TIME. I will say that if this issue gets fixed it appears to be a great value and I would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: car lights
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my son's car. He really likes them and was able to install them with ease. However he wishes they were brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Neat
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these and they work great. Good cable length. Havnt ran them and permanently installed but they are cool.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchez

customer_reviews.title: Extra cool for sons car
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this lighting effect in his new car ! Install was easy and color is great
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: My boy loves them in his truck
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted these. He installed them in his little truck in just minutes - thinks he pretty cool now. But I win for buying them for him.
customer_reviews.author: P. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LIGHTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a highly requested gift for our friends' birthdays! Everyone loved the gifts and the lights all worked perfectly and were easy to install! Will be buying more for upcoming bdays and graduations!!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are wonderful, however I bought these to bounce to the music coming out of my car speakers and there's no sensor for that. They expect you to use an app for your phone, that uses your phone mic. It crashes your phone and wipes all your bluetooth settings. Get a version that uses an external remote.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Marsicano

customer_reviews.title: Great colors ! Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The lights work perfectly. Adds a cool look to the interior.I highly suggest these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: So I love the lights but super upset that I can’t connect it to the app that had me installed into my phone. I’m just on one color and that makes me mad. I didn’t get a control like the picture or a mic to go off the music playing in my car. I’m MAD 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! I now feel like my car is a disco tech. They are easy to install and really bright. They are programmable and dimmable too! The app is a little difficult to get use to , but once you figure it put you are great!
customer_reviews.author: rose baldwin

product_meta.title: Car LED Strip Lights, Wsiiroon 4pcs 48 LED Bluetooth App Controller Interior Lights Multi Color Music Car Strip Light Under Dash Lighting Kit with Sound Active Function for iPhone Android Smart Phone.
feature_bullets: IP68 Waterproof: Made of anti-collision, anti-corrosion, ABS material, Waterproof grade IP68. Voltage: DC 12V, Wattage: 10W, lower consumption. When not use it, click the "off" button on the remote to save power.
